    @allure.story("Контракт")
    @allure.title("Контракт при 200/201: echo-поля, calculation, policyStartDate = сегодня+1")
    def test_response_contract_on_success(self, api: SafetyPillowApi):
        payload = BASE_VALID.copy()
        payload["birthDate"] = "1980-01-01T00:00:00.000"
        payload["gender"] = "M"
        payload["paymentPeriodicity"] = "MONTHLY"
        payload["term"] = 10
        attach_pretty_json(payload, "Запрос")
        resp = api.create_cached_user(payload)
        assert resp.status_code in (200, 201), _snippet(resp)
    
        j = resp.json()
        assert j.get("code") == 200
        data = j["data"]
    
        assert isinstance(data.get("calculation"), (int, float))
        assert int(data.get("debt")) == int(payload["debt"])
    
        psd_raw = data.get("policyStartDate")
        psd = _parse_loose_iso(psd_raw) if isinstance(psd_raw, str) else None
        assert psd is not None, f"policyStartDate unparsable: {psd_raw}"
    
        expected_date = _policy_start_local_date()
